abstract: Fellow officers gather at funeral for Metropolitan Transportation Authority Officer Thomas Choi of MTA's Bridges and Tunnels agency; Choi was struck by a car on Verrazano-Narrows Bridge in 2013 and succumbed to his injuries in December 2014.
lead_paragraph: Officers for the Bridges and Tunnels agency of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority gathered to remember one of their own: Officer Thomas Choi, 62, who died from his injuries on Dec. 29.
snippet: Officers for the Bridges and Tunnels agency of the Metropolitan Transportation Authority gathered to remember one of their own: Officer Thomas Choi, 62, who died from his injuries on Dec. 29.

headline.main: M.T.A. Officers Bid Farewell to Comrade Who Was Struck on the Verrazano in 2013
headline.print_headline: M.T.A. Officers Bid Farewell to Comrade Who Was Struck on the Verrazano in ’13
